parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the response. Valid values:
*   **zh** (default)
*   **en**

parameters.name: MemberUid
parameters.description: The UID of the member that is managed by your Alibaba Cloud account.

parameters.name: NatGatewayId
parameters.description: The ID of the NAT gateway.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries per page.

Default value: **10**.**** Maximum value: **50**.

parameters.name: ProxyId
parameters.description: The ID of the NAT firewall.

parameters.name: ProxyName
parameters.description: The name of the NAT firewall. The name must be 4 to 50 characters in length, and can contain letters, digits, and underscores (_). The name cannot start with an underscore.

parameters.name: RegionNo
parameters.description: The region ID of the virtual private cloud (VPC).

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The status of the NAT firewall. Valid values:

*   configuring
*   deleting
*   normal
*   abnormal
*   opening
*   closing
*   closed
